mapper.select: SELECT m.member_id, m.member_name, m.member_phone, m.member_birth, ad.address_postal, ad.address_address, ad.address_detail from dt_member m left join dt_address ad on m.address_number = ad.address_number where m.member_number = #{memberNumber}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM dt_member m WHERE m.member_id = #{memberId} AND m.member_pw = #{memberPw}
